mapper.sql: t.id id, t.sybh sybh, t.symc symc, t.sydz sydz, t.sylx sylx, t.sysxxxid sysxxxid, t.jgid jgid, t.qsxs qsxs, t.kyzt kyzt, t.syzt syzt, t.xz xz, t.czyid czyid, t.shzt shzt, t.zpwjurl zpwjurl, t.gis_x gisX, t.gis_y gisY, t.gis_h gisH, t.glid glid, t.ssld ssld, TO_CHAR(t.jzsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') jzsj, TO_CHAR(t.qysj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') qysj, t.fwtd fwtd, t.fwtn fwtn, t.fwtx fwtx, t.fwtb fwtb, t.blgxd blgxd, t.blgxn blgxn, t.blgxx blgxx, t.blgxb blgxb, t.jlzt jlzt, t.cszt cszt, t.sjbb sjbb, TO_CHAR(t.cjsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') cjsj, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.ywxtbsid ywxtbsid, t.bz bz, t.dwlxdm dwlxdm, t.dwid dwid, TO_CHAR(t.vercol,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') vercol, t.pkid pkid, t.tbjdh tbjdh, TO_CHAR(t.tbsjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') tbsjc
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(0) AS NUM FROM SY_SYJBXX t WHERE 1=1 AND JLZT = 0

SELECT
FROM SY_SYJBXX t WHERE JLZT = 0
mapper.insert:
SELECT SYS_GUID() AS pkid FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO SY_SYJBXX(id,sybh,symc,sydz,sylx,sysxxxid,jgid,qsxs,kyzt,syzt,xz,czyid,shzt,zpwjurl,gis_x,gis_y,gis_h,glid,ssld,jzsj,qysj,fwtd,fwtn,fwtx,fwtb,blgxd,blgxn,blgxx,blgxb,jlzt,cszt,sjbb,cjsj,sjc,ywxtbsid,bz,dwlxdm,dwid,vercol,pkid,tbjdh,tbsjc) VALUES(#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sybh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{symc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sydz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sylx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sysxxxid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{qsxs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{kyzt,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{syzt,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{xz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{czyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{shzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zpwjurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{gisX,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{gisY,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{gisH,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{glid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{ssld,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jzsj,jdbcType=DATE},#{qysj,jdbcType=DATE},#{fwtd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{fwtn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{fwtx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{fwtb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{blgxd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{blgxn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{blgxx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{blgxb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jlzt,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{cszt,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{sjbb,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{cjsj,jdbcType=DATE},#{sjc,jdbcType=DATE},#{ywxtbsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dwlxdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{vercol,jdbcType=DATE},#{pkid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{tbjdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{tbsjc,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: UPDATE SY_SYJBXX t SET t.JLZT = 1 WHERE 1=1 AND t.PKID = #{value}

INSERT INTO SY_SYJBXX(id,sybh,symc,sydz,sylx,sysxxxid,jgid,qsxs,kyzt,syzt,xz,czyid,shzt,zpwjurl,gis_x,gis_y,gis_h,glid,ssld,jzsj,qysj,fwtd,fwtn,fwtx,fwtb,blgxd,blgxn,blgxx,blgxb,jlzt,cszt,sjbb,cjsj,sjc,ywxtbsid,bz,dwlxdm,dwid,vercol,pkid,tbjdh,tbsjc) VALUES
#{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} id,#{item.sybh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} sybh,#{item.symc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} symc,#{item.sydz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} sydz,#{item.sylx,jdbcType=VARCHAR} sylx,#{item.sysxxxid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} sysxxxid,#{item.jgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} jgid,#{item.qsxs,jdbcType=VARCHAR} qsxs,#{item.kyzt,jdbcType=DOUBLE} kyzt,#{item.syzt,jdbcType=DOUBLE} syzt,#{item.xz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xz,#{item.czyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} czyid,#{item.shzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} shzt,#{item.zpwjurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR} zpwjurl,#{item.gisX,jdbcType=DOUBLE} gis_x,#{item.gisY,jdbcType=DOUBLE} gis_y,#{item.gisH,jdbcType=DOUBLE} gis_h,#{item.glid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} glid,#{item.ssld,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ssld,#{item.jzsj,jdbcType=DATE} jzsj,#{item.qysj,jdbcType=DATE} qysj,#{item.fwtd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} fwtd,#{item.fwtn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} fwtn,#{item.fwtx,jdbcType=VARCHAR} fwtx,#{item.fwtb,jdbcType=VARCHAR} fwtb,#{item.blgxd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} blgxd,#{item.blgxn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} blgxn,#{item.blgxx,jdbcType=VARCHAR} blgxx,#{item.blgxb,jdbcType=VARCHAR} blgxb,#{item.jlzt,jdbcType=DOUBLE} jlzt,#{item.cszt,jdbcType=DOUBLE} cszt,#{item.sjbb,jdbcType=DOUBLE} sjbb,#{item.cjsj,jdbcType=DATE} cjsj,#{item.sjc,jdbcType=DATE} sjc,#{item.ywxtbsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ywxtbsid,#{item.bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} bz,#{item.dwlxdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} dwlxdm,#{item.dwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} dwid,#{item.vercol,jdbcType=DATE} vercol,#{item.tbjdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} tbjdh,#{item.tbsjc,jdbcType=DATE} tbsjc
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE id = VALUES(id), sybh = VALUES(sybh), symc = VALUES(symc), sydz = VALUES(sydz), sylx = VALUES(sylx), sysxxxid = VALUES(sysxxxid), jgid = VALUES(jgid), qsxs = VALUES(qsxs), kyzt = VALUES(kyzt), syzt = VALUES(syzt), xz = VALUES(xz), czyid = VALUES(czyid), shzt = VALUES(shzt), zpwjurl = VALUES(zpwjurl), gis_x = VALUES(gis_x), gis_y = VALUES(gis_y), gis_h = VALUES(gis_h), glid = VALUES(glid), ssld = VALUES(ssld), jzsj = VALUES(jzsj), qysj = VALUES(qysj), fwtd = VALUES(fwtd), fwtn = VALUES(fwtn), fwtx = VALUES(fwtx), fwtb = VALUES(fwtb), blgxd = VALUES(blgxd), blgxn = VALUES(blgxn), blgxx = VALUES(blgxx), blgxb = VALUES(blgxb), jlzt = VALUES(jlzt), cszt = VALUES(cszt), sjbb = VALUES(sjbb), cjsj = VALUES(cjsj), sjc = VALUES(sjc), ywxtbsid = VALUES(ywxtbsid), bz = VALUES(bz), dwlxdm = VALUES(dwlxdm), dwid = VALUES(dwid), vercol = VALUES(vercol), pkid = VALUES(pkid), tbjdh = VALUES(tbjdh), tbsjc = VALUES(tbsjc)

SELECT
FROM SY_SYJBXX t WHERE t.JLZT = 0

FROM SY_SYJBXX t WHERE JLZT = 0
